title: Banned For Protection Hasnt Been removed yet
body: My account was suspended for protection while we reset the email and password, I changed the account email and checked it. Could someone remove the ban?

replies.body: If you were originally talking to a Support Agent in a ticket about the ban for protection, make sure to reply back to that ticket!  They should be able to help you out and remove the suspension!
Could you check for me? Id like to play soon and im not getting any response.
If you still haven't received a response, feel free to copy/paste the unique ticket number and I'll take a look!

Unfortunately the waiting times for Riot Support can't go below a few hours please understand them. Try some day to fill 2 different tickets at 1 day of distance and see the difference in protocol number. That's the number of requests they had in 1 day.
